title: Get the members of a BC

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. The maximum page size is 20.

parameters.name: user_role
parameters.description: Basic roles within Business Center. Enum values: ADMIN : Admins can manage the Business Center's members and assets. STANDARD : Standard members can only work on the ad accounts they've been assigned to.

parameters.name: relation_status
parameters.description: User's relation to the Business Center. If the invitation to join the Business Center is still pending, or has been accepted. Enum values: BOUND : The request to manage the asset has been approved by the owner. PENDING : The request to manage the asset is pending on the owner's approval. REJECTED : The request to manage the asset has been rejected by the owner.
